con:requirement.con:name: [Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API should not return any record if there is no Pay with Point Reward exist for the program
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API should not return any record if there is no pay with point tender configure for the program
Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return pooled balance
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record based if the transaction date is grater than reward start date but less than reward end date
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record if there is pay with point tender and reward configure for the program
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record if there is mutiple tender of type pay with point and reward configure for the program for the same point type
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record if profile qualifies for pay with points reward with different point types
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record based on tender code filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record based point type filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud return reward and other deatails record based currency code filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud not return reward and other deatails record if tier code in reward and profile does not match
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance API shoud not return reward and other deatails record if segment in reward and profile does not match
Create/update API to insert EL Segment Description and Icon for the requested Segment (code) submitted from Admin UI
con:requirement.con:description: Create/update API to insert EL Segment Description and Icon for the requested Segment (code) submitted from Admin UI

con:requirement.con:name: Verify that the Profile Balance Full Extract Datahub workflow creates the handback file
con:requirement.con:description: Verify that the Profile Balance Full Extract Datahub workflow creates the handback file

con:requirement.con:name: DB schema and API should be updated for Program Setting>Insights
con:requirement.con:description: DB schema and API should be updated for Program Setting>Insights

con:requirement.con:name: [Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting API should not return any record if if there is no Pay with Point Reward exist for the program
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should not return any record if there is no pay with point tender configure for the program
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record based if the transaction date is grater than reward start date but less than reward end date
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should not return reward and other details record if segment in reward and profile does not match
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting key API should not return reward and other details record if tier code in reward and profile does not match
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record if there is pay with point tender and reward configure for the program

[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API return reward and other details record if there is multiple tender of type pay with point and reward configure for the program for the same point type
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record based on tender code filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record based point type filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record based currency code filter
[Ready API]Get Pay With Points Balance By Posting Key API should return reward and other details record based if the transaction date is grater than reward start date but less than reward end date
